parts:
# About Us  

At **engageLively**, we are on a mission to eliminate the "IT Tax"—the unnecessary time, money, and effort enterprises expend on acquiring, configuring, managing, and maintaining IT resources. We believe technology should empower businesses, not burden them.  

That’s why we created the **Galyleo Platform**: a truly turnkey solution that lets organizations focus on their goals instead of grappling with complex IT infrastructure. Within just **ten minutes**, Galyleo is fully operational, accessible from anywhere via a simple web browser. No lengthy deployments. No hidden hurdles. Just immediate value, designed to work seamlessly from day one.  

Our commitment goes beyond technology. At engageLively, we aim to provide solutions that are as intuitive as they are powerful. We envision a world where innovation drives business outcomes, and technology serves as a catalyst—not a cost.  

Join us in redefining how enterprises leverage IT, and let’s unlock the full potential of your organization together.

# About Us  

At **engageLively**, we are on a mission to eliminate the "IT Tax"—the unnecessary time, money, and effort enterprises expend on acquiring, configuring, managing, and maintaining IT resources. We believe technology should empower businesses, not burden them.  

That’s why we created the **Galyleo Platform**: a truly turnkey solution that lets organizations focus on their goals instead of grappling with complex IT infrastructure. Within just **ten minutes**, Galyleo is fully operational, accessible from anywhere via a simple web browser. No lengthy deployments. No hidden hurdles. Just immediate value, designed to work seamlessly from day one.  

Our commitment goes beyond technology. At engageLively, we aim to provide solutions that are as intuitive as they are powerful. We envision a world where innovation drives business outcomes, and technology serves as a catalyst—not a cost.  

Join us in redefining how enterprises leverage IT, and let’s unlock the full potential of your organization together.

parts:
### Why Open Source Matters to Us  

At **engageLively**, we believe in the transformative power of open-source development. Open-source projects evolve at the speed of the community—unleashing the creativity, innovation, and collaboration of a global network of contributors. This pace far outstrips the progress of closed-source projects, which are limited by the resources and vision of a single vendor.  

This is why our **Galyleo Platform** is, and always will be, **100% open-source**. By embracing open source, we invite the collective ingenuity of developers, designers, and users worldwide to continually enhance and refine our platform. The result? A solution that reflects the very best ideas, tools, and practices the global community has to offer.  

Open source isn’t just a development model for us—it’s a philosophy. It ensures transparency, fosters trust, and empowers our customers to benefit from an ecosystem that’s constantly improving, adapting, and innovating.  

When you choose Galyleo, you’re not just choosing a platform—you’re becoming part of a dynamic community that’s reshaping the way technology supports business. Together, we’re building the future, faster and better than ever before.
